SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
F/V AMALIA, EIGHT PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING
ASSISTANCE IN VICINITY 14-50.35S 007-48.68W
AT 180700Z MAR. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
TO MRCC CAPE TOWN, PHONE: 272 1938 3300,
E-MAIL: MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA,
MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA.
